attributes.action: Refuse to allow early recess at this time of political uncertainty for the UK
attributes.additional_details:
They work for us and should not be rewarded for disastrous incompetence with extra holiday. They should face the consequences of their actions.

https://www.bbc.com/news/uk-politics-44853464
attributes.background: At this time of political uncertainty about Brexit and with her ministers resigning, Teresa May and her unstable government are seeking to bring forward their sum.er holiday simply to avoid a vote of no confidence and further embarrassing incidents.
